name: Test Chamber (SrRAS)
description:
Test Chamber is a multiplayer puzzle game that can be played for 1 up to 5 players, the puzzles in the game are simple, but the players will need to cooperate saying what they see and trading information to complete all rooms.

This game was idealized to train esports teams about communicating, it's better when played with 5 players but you can play even alone.

In the menu you can set the maximum time to play in minutes (60 minutes default recommended) also, the players need to enter in different colors to play (no internet or any server needed), anyway, the team still need a way to communicate

use WASD to move and the mouse to interact with the puzzles

Good Game!
